properties.description: Open to anyone during these hours, but optional groups: Tues - WOW creative writers, Thurs AM - toddlers, PM - knitting/croche, Fri AM - seniors

properties.address: All Saint's Church Hall, Chirk Road, Gobowen, Oswestry SY11 3LL
properties.description: Thursdays we are open for refreshments, company, conversation etc in our Community Cafe 14:30-16:00. Sundays we are open for our church service at 11am. Hot drinks are available after the service in the hall from 12:15.
